sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Netkit-base package contains the inetd and ping programs.

sect3.title: inetd
sect3.para: inetd is the mother of all daemons. It listens for connections, and transfers the call to the appropriate daemon.

sect3.title: ping
sect3.para: ping sends ICMP ECHO_REQUEST packets to a host and determines its response time.
